summary: I HAVE A TRIUMPH SPRINT ST ([XXX]) IT WAS AFFECTED BY NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 00V312000.  THE RECALL WAS DONE AND IT DID HAVE A FUEL LEAK.  SINCE THEN I HAVE HAD CONSTANT RECURRING FUEL LEAKS.  THE THIRD FUEL LEAK OCCURRED ON AUG 31, 2002 AND NOW A TEXAS LEMON LAW HEARING IS PENDING.  I RETURNED THE MOTORCYCLE FOR THE LAST TIME SEPT 3, 2002 AND INFORMED THEM THAT I WAS NO LONGER INTERESTED IN RISKING MY LIFE.  I WILL BE SENDING A COPY OF ALL THE PAPER WORK INVOLVING THIS CASE.  THANK YOU.    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
